name: Drop It! Crazy Color Puzzle
description:
Train your brain with this addictive time killer from Artik Games!

Match and Merge!
Drop It is an quick but challenging puzzle game where you match and combine blocks to merge colors.

Time killer for puzzlers!
Great for one minute bursts or hours of addictive fun! This color matching puzzle is easy to play but hard to reach high scores.

Game features
★ Colorful puzzle action
★ Easy to play, hard to master
★ No time limit
★ For peace of mind
★ Endless gameplay
★ Play with one hand
★ Compete with friends
